name: Fonts
description: Replace Notion's default fonts with any font installed on your system.

options.label: Sans serif
options.description: Sets the font used across Notion's interface and as the default page font. Leave this blank to use Notion's default sans serif font.
options.value: ui-sans-serif, -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, "Segoe UI", Helvetica, "Apple Color Emoji", Arial, sans-serif, "Segoe UI Emoji", "Segoe UI Symbol"

options.description: Sets the font used on serif-styled pages (configurable via the Style, export and more... menu). Leave this blank to use Notion's default serif font.
Sets the font used on mono-styled pages (configurable via the Style, export and more... menu). Leave this blank to use Notion's default monospaced font.
Sets the font used for code blocks and inline code. Leave this blank to use Notion's default code font.
options.value: "SFMono-Regular", Menlo, Consolas, "PT Mono", "Liberation Mono", Courier, monospace

options.description: Sets the font used for math equations. Leave this blank to use Notion's default math font.
Sets the font used for quote blocks. Leave this blank to inherit the page's font style.
Sets the font used for page headings. Leave this blank to inherit the page's font style.
